title: A Sleepy Surprise Trilogy
description: Ever since her birthday Elizabeth has been waking up in the morning a few times a week so very sore, like she's been running a marathon all night. Not only that but she's been having weird dreams about her Mother's new husband Michael, a man Elizabeth absolutely adores. In the dreams he whispers naughty things in her ear, touches her body in places he really shouldn't, and a whole lot more. Are these just dreams just manifestations of Elizabeth's darkest fantasies?This trilogy of stories follows Elizabeth's adventures from finding out about what's going on in her room at night, her growing desire to have Michael's offspring, to the special way Michael ensures her graduation by sharing her with her principal and math teacher. Every story has at least one surprise for somebody!Part 1 "A Sleepy Surprise" is also available in the "A New Start" collection of stories.These stories contain explicit descriptions of bedroom fun between older men and a beautiful blonde.
author: Scarlett Skyes
